data.name: Email_BodyUserRegistration
data.value: Hello {0}, Thank you for joining GradSync! To complete your registration, please verify your email by clicking the link below: Verify Account This link will expire in 1 hour. If it doesn’t work, copy and paste the URL below into your browser. {1} If you didn’t sign up for GradSync, you can ignore this email. Best regards, The GradSync Team

data.name: Email_SubjectUserPasswordReset
data.value: Your GradSync Password Has Been Reset

data.name: Email_BodyUserPasswordReset
data.value:
Hello {0},
Your password has been successfully reset. Please use the temporary password below to log in:
Temporary Password: {1}
For your security, we recommend changing this password as soon as you log in.
If you didn’t request this reset, please email support@gradsync.org or admin@gradsync.org immediately.
Best regards, The GradSync Team

data.name: Email_BodyUserRequestPasswordReset
data.value: Hello {0}, We received a request to reset your GradSync password. To continue, please click the link below: Reset Password This link will expire in 1 hour. If it doesn’t work, copy and paste the URL below into your browser. {1} If you didn’t request this reset, you can safely ignore this email. Thank you, The GradSync Team

data.name: Email_SubjectUserRequestPasswordReset
data.value: Password Reset Request for Your GradSync Account

data.name: Email_SubjectApplicationAccepted
data.value: Congratulations! Your Application for {0} Has Been Accepted

data.name: Email_SubjectApplicationShortlisted
data.value: Good News! Your Application for {0} Has Been Shortlisted

data.name: Email_SubjectApplicationRejected
data.value: Update on Your Application for {0} at {1}

data.name: Email_BodyApplicationAccepted
data.value:
Hello {0},
We are pleased to inform you that your application for the {1} position at {2} has been accepted by the recruiter. Congratulations!
Next Steps: - The recruiter may reach out to you soon with further details. - Feel free to log in to your account and check the application to view any messages or updates.
If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.
Best regards, The GradSync Team info@gradsync.org | support@gradsync.org

data.name: Email_BodyApplicationRejected
data.value:
Hello {0},
Thank you for applying for the {1} position at {2}.
We wanted to let you know that the recruiter has reviewed your application and has decided to proceed with other candidates at this time.
We encourage you to explore other job opportunities on our platform that may suit your skills and interests.
If you have any questions or need assistance, please contact us.
Best regards, The GradSync Team info@gradsync.org | support@gradsync.org

data.name: Email_BodyApplicationShortlisted
data.value:
Hello {0},
Exciting news! The recruiter for the {1} position at {2} has shortlisted your application.
What This Means: - The recruiter is interested in moving forward with your application. - They may contact you soon to schedule an interview or request additional information.
You can check for messages from the recruiter by logging into your account and checking the application.
If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us.
Best regards, The GradSync Team info@gradsync.org | support@gradsync.org

data.name: Email_BodyApplicationNew
data.value:
Hello {0}
You have received a new application for the {1} position you posted.
Please log in to your recruiter dashboard to review the application.
If you need assistance or have any questions, we're here to help.
Best regards, The GradSync Team info@gradsync.org | support@gradsync.org

data.name: Email_BodyApplicationWithdrawn
data.value:
Hello {0},
We wanted to inform you that {1} has withdrawn their application for the {2} position.
The application has been updated accordingly in your dashboard.
If you have any questions or need further assistance, please contact us.
Best regards, The GradSync Team info@gradsync.org | support@gradsync.org
